title: 8bar Tflsberg is back for bikepacking 2.0 as a burly steel dropbar adventure mountain bike
content:
8bar has brought back the off-road-exploring Tflsberg as an all-new steel bikepacking bike for heavily loaded dropbar adventures. Sure you can call it a monster gravel bike if you want. But 8bar is adamant that the new Tflsberg is probably more a mountain touring bike, designed for extra long days in the saddle exploring rough,

The post 8bar Tflsberg is back for bikepacking 2.0 as a burly steel dropbar adventure mountain bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
